plot: An English businessman comes home to London, only to find visitors to his home being killed by arrows from "the Green Archer."
title: El arquero verde
plot_es: An English businessman comes home to London, only to find visitors to his home being killed by arrows from "the Green Archer."
plot_en: An English businessman comes home to London, only to find visitors to his home being killed by arrows from "the Green Archer."
